select1.label: Wash hands
Assemble and arrange equipment on bed side chair or table , remove unnecessary equipment , such as over bed table
Lower side rail of near side of bed and remove call light
Adjust bed height to comfortable working position
On near side loosen linen starting at top of bed. move along sides and then down toward foot. Move to other side of bed , lower side rail and loosen linen

Remove bedspread and blanket separately by folding each bath or folded square and discarding into linen bag if they are not be reused . Don't allow uniform to come in contact with soiled linen. Avoid fanning or shaking linen,

If spread or blanket is to be reused , fold as follows . Fold each spread by grasping top edge with both hands , one hand at end , fold top edge down , even with bottom edge . pick up spread at centre and fold so that farthest side comes even with nearest side, bring top and bottom edges together and again place folded spread or blanket over back of chair
Remove soiled pillow cases by grasping closed end with one hand and slipping pillow out with other . discard pillow cases in linen bag and place pillows on table
Fold each piece of remaining bed linen separately into ball or folded square and discard in linen bag
Slide mattress toward head of bed
Wipe of moisture on mattress with wash cloth moistened in antiseptic solution , dry thoroughly
Stand at side of bed where linen is placed . Spread mattress pad on the mattress
Smooth out all wrinkles in pad

Unfold bottom sheet lengthwise, and place vertical centres crease length wise along centres of bed. Fold sheets top layer toward opposite side of bed . Smooth bottom layers of sheet across mattress on near side of side, bring edge over side of mattress . Allow it to hang 25 cm, over mattress edge . lower hem of bottom sheet should lie seam down even with bottom edge of metres .pull remaining top position of sheet over edge of mattress

While standing at head of bed , miter top corner of bottom sheet - Face head of bed diagonally , place hand away from head of bed under top corners of mattress near mattress edge and lift - With other hand , tuck top edge of bottom sheet smoothly under mattress so that side edges of sheet above and below mattress would meet if brought together - Face side bed and pick up top edge of sheet approximately 45cm down from top of matress - First sheet and lay on top of mattress to form neat , for angles fold , with lower base of triangle even with mattress side edge - Tuck lower edge of sheet , hanging free below mattress , under mattress .tuck with palms down without pulling angles fold - Hold position of sheet covering side edge of mattress is placed with one hand .with other hand pick up top of triangles linen fold and bring it down over side of mattress . take this position under mattress
Tuck remaining position of sheet under mattress. keep linen smooth
Open draw sheet so it unfolds half. Lay centrefolds along middle of bed lenghthwise .fanfold top layers at centers bed. Smooth bottom layers of draw sheet over mattress
Tuck excess edge , under mattress keeping palms down
Move to opposite side of bed
Spread fan folded bottom sheet smoothly on the edge of mattress from head to foot of bed
Mitter top corner of bottom sheet . when tucking corner , be sure sheet is taut
Facing side of bed , grasp remaining edge of bottom sheet , lean back , keeping your back straight and pull as you tuck excess linen tightly under mattress proceed from head to foot of bed
If needed , apply water proof pad or bath blanket over draw sheet
Smooth folded draw sheet over bottom sheet .grasp sheet under mattress . tuck first at middle , then at top and then at bottom

Move to side of bed where linen is located place top sheet over bed with vertical centrefold lengthwise down middle of bed .open sheet cut from head to foot , being sure top edge of sheet is seam up and even with top edge of mattress . spread excess sheet over bottom edge of mattress
Make horizontal toe pleat , stand at foot of bed and from fold in sheet 5 -10 cm across bed .pull sheet up from bottom edge of mattress
Took in remaining portion of sheet on one side of foot of mattress

Place blanket or bed , unfolding it so that creass runs lenghthwise along middle of bed . top edge should be parallel with edge of top sheet and 15-20 cm down mattress top edge . bottom edge should hang over mattress spread blanket evenly on bed
Place spread over bed according to step 28 be sure that top edge of spreads extends about 2.5cm above blanket edge . then tuck top edge of spread over and under top edge of blanket
Make cuff by running edge of top sheet down over top edge of blanket and spread

Standing on one side of foot of bed lift mattress corner slightly with one hand and with other hand tuck top sheet, blanket and spread under mattress . because you have not pulled cut toe pleat of sheets so that linens are loose enough for client to move

Make modified mittered corners with top sheet, blanket and spread pick up side edge of top sheet , blanket and spread approximately 45 cm up from foot of mattress up from foot of mattress .lift linens to form triangular fold and lay it on bed. Tuck loose edge hanging down under over mattress , holding linen along side of mattress .dont tuck tip of triangle
Go to other side of bed , spread over blanket and make cuff with top sheet .make modified mittered corner at foot of bed

Apply clean pillow case with one hand , grasp pillow case of center of closed end . gates case , turning it inside out over hand holding it , with same hand pick up middle of one end of pillow .pull pillowcase down over pillow with other hand
Position pillows at center of head of bed
Place call light within client reach and return bed to comfortable height
If client is to return to bed , fold back top covers to one side as fanfold them down to bottom third of bed
Rearrange furniture and place personal items within easy reach
Discard dirty linen in hamper or chute , wash hands
Bed making need not be documented .record client vital signs and symptoms only if there are changes
